rules.description: Left Cmd to Left Alt, if Apple Keyboard
Left Alt to Left Cmd, if Apple Keyboard
Right Cmd to Right Alt, if Apple Keyboard
Right Alt to Right Cmd, if Apple Keyboard
CapsLock to Left Ctrl, or ESC if pressed alone
Enter to Right Ctrl, or Enter if pressed alone
Left Shift to Left Shift, or opening parenthesis if pressed alone
Right Shift to Right Shift, or closing parenthesis if pressed alone
Left Ctrl to Left Hyper, or CapsLock if pressed alone
Right Ctrl to Right Hyper, or CapsLock if pressed alone
